body:
To me this makes sense, as any variable that starts with "k" is a constant. And here, they are really constants, their values will never ever change. Almost like macros.
When I look at the tensors below, they are constants but their values will be set at runtime.

So IMHO this makes the code more readable for me.

So IMHO this makes the code more readable for me.
body_text:
To me this makes sense, as any variable that starts with "k" is a constant. And here, they are really constants, their values will never ever change. Almost like macros.
When I look at the tensors below, they are constants but their values will be set at runtime.
So IMHO this makes the code more readable for me.
